duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clerical support and receptionist duties for the unit, assisting with activities based on patient needs under the direction of the RN.
Monitor patients' EKG waveforms in a centralized monitoring station and notify the RN of any rhythm changes.
Answer the phone promptly, transfer calls as needed, and collaborate with the team to deliver quality care.
Print or copy documents as requested to support the clinical team and perform clerical duties as requested.
Maintain integrity of the telemetry system, admit, transfer, or discharge patients, and report malfunctions or needed equipment adjustments.
Keep nursing station and public areas clean and tidy, order and manage stock in the unit as needed, and schedule follow-up appointments for discharged patients.

education_certification.credential: High School or equivalent, Completion of EKG monitoring class, and 1-2 years of related experience. Certification in Medical Terminology and BCLS required.
